How can I give Black Friday Deals !!

It’s your time now, Are you looking to do your own startup? Looking to make your own product?? Waiting to make your own sales? Here we are, Get started with us. If you are looking make your startup and looking for some tech company or app development company to get started. Then you are at right place. We are here to develop the application or product you are looking for. Get your product with us and start giving your own from next year.

 

Secrets of the Successful Hybrid Mobile Apps

Check the demo and reach our support team who all are always waiting to provide our valuable services. Share all the necessary details and get your products delivered instantly.

There will be no hidden charges, no locks, full source code will be provided without any restrictions. And we will provide our support team to help you anytime.

 

Don’t go with Hybrid Mobile App Development

Or simply Email your Requirements or skype us whatever you are comfortable with. We will reach you in very shorter time, Grab your requirements, Get your application done.

We are super excited to hear from you. Or just simply share your views on comments or mail us: info@hasotech.com

item.title: Very easy to Develop a Mobile App
item.dc:creator: admin
item.description: The post Very easy to Develop a Mobile App appeared first on Hasotech.
item.content:encoded:
When we want to develop a mobile app, we might be looking for some mobile app developers. We may check for freelancer or mobile app development companies. Before going to search for someone to develop, Make a small analysis either we really need someone to develop a mobile app? Why can’t we develop on our own? Is this necessary to have someone to develop a mobile app? Is this that much tough to develop a mobile app? Here we at HasoTechnology have come across many startups and enterprise clients. When it comes to startup we always suggest them the better idea and check for the importance of having a mobile.

Do we really need to Develop a Mobile App?

Before getting started to develop a mobile app, Let’s make a small analysis on Do we really need to develop a mobile app? Of course not. There are many online tools available to generate mobile apps and also sometimes many readymade solutions are available. There is no need to develop a mobile app always from scratch. If you are looking for the school bus tracking system or an E-commerce mobile application, You may get many ready-made solutions on that. But always make sure, All the customizations can be done as per the requirements. Also, there are many online tools available to generate mobile apps.  Some of the tools to develop a mobile app online are appsgeyser, ibuildapp, appsbar etc.,

Before getting on finding a developer or company to develop a mobile app, Try some find some readymade solutions or online tools to develop on your own. However, if the requirements are unique and customizable. It is better to develop own custom solutions.

What’s crazy on Mobile App Development

Can we develop a Mobile App on our own?

Anyone can able to develop a mobile app since technology has made everything easy. If you are a person having some knowledge of technology or willing to learn it, Developing a mobile app is not a big thing. If you are the one, We recommend starting with Hybrid Mobile application development. Especially when you want to make a mobile app on both Android and iOS, it is good to go with Hybrid Mobile Application development to save time. When it comes to Hybrid Mobile app development, It is Ionic framework to get started with. Get to know more about Ionic Mobile app developer.

Is this necessary to have someone to Develop a Mobile App?

Do you want to make a professional mobile app? Then go with Mobile app Development Company.  In case if you are trying to implement some unique idea, instead of spending money and time better to have a mockup of mobile app and make some improvements before choosing someone to develop the app. Always have a fixed requirements and do not change it in order to get good output.

iPhone X iOS 11 Mobile App Development

Before getting started on it, Have a look on Know about Mobile App Development article. Get to know the basics before stepping into it.

Do comment your thoughts on Developing a Mobile app and your experience with it.

I am text block. Click edit button to change this text. Lorem ipsum dolor sit amet, consectetur adipiscing elit. Ut elit tellus, luctus nec ullamcorper mattis, pulvinar dapibus leo.

item.title: iPhone X iOS 11 Mobile App Development
item.dc:creator: admin
item.description: The post iPhone X iOS 11 Mobile App Development appeared first on Hasotech.
item.content:encoded:
iOS 11 Mobile App Development

Here we go with most awaited iPhone X and iOS 11 updates which were officially launched on September 13th 2K17. And we are excited to know about new products from apple and new iPhone X with iOS 11. The pre order of iPhone X starts from Sep 15th. So what’s next now? Apple has done with their part now it’s our turn to develop applications for iPhone X and iOS 11. Before going to iPhone X iOS 11 Mobile App Development, Let’s check about what’s new in iOS 11.

What’s new in iOS 11 Mobile App Development

Apple always makes a revolution on each update. For iOS 11 Mobile App Development, they have made a very optimistic update using the power of Machine learning. The next future of Mobile App Development is Augmented Reality which they have integrated with this update. Now we can build Super cool iOS 11 Mobile App in Augmented Reality with ARKit.

Other than Machine Learning and Augmented Reality,  The new Camera APIs, Sirikit, Music integration and much more with iOS 11 Mobile App development. iOS 11 can able to perform multithreading more effectively than other iOS versions which really going to make this update more optimistic. Let’s check on what we can do with Machine Learning in iOS 11 Mobile app development.

Machine Learning – iOS 11 Mobile App Development

Instead of just making iOS 11 Mobile applications now we can say like building iOS 11. Apple uses Core ML which is used by its products like Siri, camera, quick type. Now Core ML integration has been made easy with iOS 11 Mobile App development. We can build fast performance Intelligent iOS 11 Mobile apps.

Core ML provides support on Deep learning which built on low-level technologies. Hence the CPU and GPU usage will be highly optimized. With Core ML we can make

  • Face Detection
  • Text Detection
  • Barcode Detection
  • landmarks
  • image Registration
  • Object Tracking
  • Face Tracking

And with its Natural Language processing APIs, We can make language detection, text recognition and build very high level iOS 11 Mobile Applications.

What’s crazy on Mobile App Development

Augmented Reality – iOS 11 Mobile App Development

Very new thing with iOS 11 is Augmented Reality Kit (ARKit) new framework. We all have would played pokemon go game at least once. Now we can make similar applications in iOS 11 Mobile App Development. Lets start making real world interaction application with iOS 11 ARKit.

With iPhone X camera which is a true depth camera which defines position, expression, topology all as it is. This will helps to make a 3 D character with ARKit. With the position and Camera sensors, The core motion data generated which actually feeds input to ARKit to develop Augmented Reality Applications.

The sensors used in iPhone X which really helps to make more realistic applications. Apple has provided the magic kit to us and now its our turn to make the magic happens. Lets get our hand dirty for making iOS 11 Mobile App Development.

If you are looking to make Hybrid Mobile app for iPhone X, It’s not good time to go with since the changes made in size and screen cuts. Hybrid Mobile Application frameworks like Ionic Framework need to make updates for those. If you have solution or better idea on those, Share your thoughts over comments.

Get your  Application developed with us

The post iPhone X iOS 11 Mobile App Development appeared first on Hasotech.
